description:
Virtual reality for biomolecular electrostatics UnityMol-APBS (NIH iEdison No. 0685901-19-0009, Grant No. GM069702)
Visualization of molecular electrostatics on a two-dimensional screen greatly diminishes the associated depth component.
Using a virtual world to explore molecular electrostatics allows researchers to be immersed within their data.
name: UnityMol-APBS
